title: Mediterranean Delivery Food in Las Vegas

contentMarkdown:
## Mediterranean Delivery Food in Las Vegas
Las Vegas offers a variety of Mediterranean food options for delivery. Try our signature döner, shawarma, and more!

title: Halal: What Does It Mean?
excerpt: A quick guide to what halal means for Mediterranean cuisine lovers.
contentMarkdown:
## Halal: What Does It Mean?
Halal means permissible in Arabic. In Mediterranean cuisine, it refers to food prepared according to Islamic law.
